My entire chat log, as ashamed as I am. 

This is my second and final ban on this, my first, league account. My entire team was flaming me for picking Evelynn mid, which they were rightfully mad over. I was not paying attention in lobby and didn't realise I was mid before I locked in. They then proceeded  to harass me for the entire game - every death - every mistake. My ENTIRE team. 

There are a few messages that, without context, would look very inappropriate:

Aquariuus: veig get dark seal
Aquariuus: and then mejais
&
Aquariuus: and even so, picking evelynn mid isn't against the rules lmao ? XD
 
The first couple of messages I have used were in light of the obvious difficulty I was having against Veigar. I was not inting whatsoever, simply prompting an opponent to advance themselves. 

The third message looks like I was saying I chose Eve on purpose, but truthfully, context really matters. An ally was complaining about me picking Evelynn despite me clearly making a mistake, which I replied to with "Even so"- (me, explaining that EVEN IF I had picked Evelynn on purpose,) -"picking evelynn mid isn't against the rules lmao ? XD"

Also, I am not complaining or appealing in any way, I am simply asking for opinions.

Still hurts tho {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Why don't you just use the mute buttons?

Most of these "banned" posts could have been avoided by just muting other players.
Maybe you were spamming chat, harrassing and cussing. Was this throughout the whole game?
I'm not asking for should-ofs could-ofs or would-ofs. I'm asking for opinions on whether or not this is rightful
Well believe it or not, but we don't affect whether your banned or not, you are banned.
